item.title: A Lighting bolt.. Did this for a server I play on
item.dc:creator: @ayeitswill ayeitswill
item.description:
@ayeitswill wrote:

Zymus:

Can you use it like a rifle and shoot lightning at your enemies? What runes does it use?

None but that sounds awesome. I was just using the gfx of the Sarasword for it. Looks sick
